person.name: Kevin W. Pearson
person.description: Elder Kevin W. Pearson was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008. At the time of his call, he had been serving as the president of the Washington Tacoma Mission. Currently he is serving in the Pacific Area Presidency. He previously served as a counselor in the Europe East Area and as an Assistant Executive Director of the Missionary Department.
